trustfund:
TF040298-BRAZIL - PREPARATION OF QUALITY
            ENHANCEMENT IN BASIC EDUCATION,TF026318-PHRD-DESIGN OF AN ENVIRONMENTAL

abstracts.cdata!:
The general objectives of the Second
            Basic Education Quality Improvement Project are to: (a)
            expand coverage and improve quality of preschool and
            elementary education, and (b) achieve greater social equity
            by targeting the expansion of the new pedagogical
            single-shift (full-time) model of teaching within preschool
            education and elementary education to socio-economically
            disadvantaged population. The objectives of the
            univeralization of preschool education component are (a) to
            expand the coverage of preschool educate to nearly 100% of
            children of age 4 and 5; and (b) to improve the quality of
            public preschool education. The component consists of five
            sub-components: classroom construction;; classroom equipment
            and learning materials; training, studies; and promotional
            campaign for parents and families. The objective of the
            single shift - full time schools component is to expand a
            new pedagogical model of full time schools targeted to those
            children from socio-economically disadvantaged families,
            thus improving the quality of primary education they receive
            and expanding their access to learning opportunities. This
            component consists of five sub-components: improvement of
            the existing full time schools, classroom equipment and
            learning materials; training and technical assistance to
            schools; studies; and promotional campaign.
